column4: does anyone know why my computer will not go to the grub menu, or boot from usb?
does anyone know why my computer will not go to the grub menu, or boot from usb?
does anyone know why my computer will not go to the grub menu, or boot from usb?
try looking at the bios splash screen, usually you will see something like "press f8 to select boot device" or similar, if your machine can boot from USB, the option will be there
